title: Cybersecurity Threat Response Strategy Design for Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Information systems fundamentals and domain-specific knowledge by job role
context.additional_context: Professionals in healthcare, legal, and technical fields who require understanding the interconnectedness between technology-driven threats and societal impacts.

learning_goals: Five types of cybersecurity threats can be identified and their risk levels can be evaluated through real-case analysis
Three industry-specific threat mitigation strategies can be designed through collaborative problem-solving
The expanded cybersecurity perspective, including the necessity of protecting national critical infrastructure, can be explained in a social context
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
